short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block websites based on a schedule.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your online productivity with Website Blocker, a powerful Chrome extension that helps you manage website access based on your schedule.

Key Features:
- Schedule-based website blocking
- Flexible blocking modes: Block List or Permitted Sites
- Easy-to-use interface with time and day selection
- Customizable schedules for different days of the week
- Support for both blocking and allowing specific websites
- Video and media content support
- Clean, intuitive interface

Perfect for:
- Students focusing on study time
- Professionals managing work hours
- Parents controlling website access
- Anyone looking to improve productivity

How it works:
1. Choose between Block List or Permitted Sites mode
2. Add websites to your list
3. Set your schedule by selecting days and times
4. Let the extension handle the rest!

The extension runs smoothly in the background and automatically manages website access according to your schedule. Whether you want to block distracting sites during work hours or only allow specific sites during study time, Website Blocker has you covered.
